name: Void Of Light (Adri Pérez)
description:
Void Of Light is a small game, about 30 minutes of gameplay with 2.5 style and puzzle-platform game with easy mechanics!

----- SYNOPSYS -----

     Our character has the time to be discarded. But at the moment when they separate the orb from the body there is an overload of energy, which causes a blackout and everything is paralyzed.

     Then the orb falls to the recycling plant by mistake, without body and with self-consciousness. If you were to spend a lot of time without a body would go off and just fall desperately looking for a robot.

     Here begins your adventure, confused and afraid will try to find out what's behind so many experiments.

----- CONTROLS -----

Only PS4 controller

----- DEVELOPERS ----- Artists

Lucas Ramos: Visual Developer & Concept Artist
Adrián Domingo: 3D Artist & Textures
Diego Llácer: 3D Artist, Animator and Rigger
Pascual Hernández: 3D Artist & Textures

Programmers

Silvia Sanchis
Luis Santos
Adri Pérez
